name: shuffle-algorithm
description: Inspired from a video by [gabi belle](https://www.youtube.com/@itsgabibelle) on [Why Spotify Playlists Never Truly Shuffle](https://youtu.be/OdLyKETk5o0) This following link give me a sense of what information Spotify collected/calculated for a single song. [LINK](https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/web-api/reference/#/operations/get-audio-analysis)
